entry.title: Organic Yaupon-1KG
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Yaupon
Price: 262.50

 


Yaupon is the only caffeinated plant native to North America.  This plant was used by native Americans and early settlers to North America.  It was even shipped to Europe.   

Here we are in the 21st century and it has been revived as a sustainable tea.

It's sustainably wild-harvested, hand packed and the only thing touches this plant is sunshine and rain.

This medium roast has an amazing aroma of maple a beautiful golden liquor and flavour similar to yerbe matte but sweeter.  

Packed in a  kraft bag which is biodegradable.  

Brew 1 teaspoon in 8 ounces of water for 4 -7 minutes

Re-brew up to three times

Grown: Texas, USA

Tea(s) From: China
Region(s): Hunan Province
Steeping Instructions:  Brew 2-4 minutes at 150-160F

Re brew a second time.

entry.title: Organic Green Yaupon- 40G-New
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Yaupon
Price: 15.00

 

Organic Green yaupon is not roasted like our medium roast yaupon.  It's dried in the same way as green tea which is minimally processed. Steep these beautiful green leaves the same as any green tea.

Here we are in the 21st century and it has been revived as a sustainable tea.

It's sustainably wild-harvested, hand packed and the only thing touches this plant is sunshine and rain.

Packed in a  kraft bag which is biodegradable.  

Brew 1 teaspoon in 8 ounces of water for 4 -7 minutes

Re-brew up to three times

Perfect for iced tea!

Grown: Texas, USA

entry.title: Grosche Laval Tea Infuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grosche
Type: Accessory
Price: 12.00

The GROSCHE LAVAL loose tea infuser is perfect for any cup, mug, or small teapot. The LAVAL is suitable for all loose leaf teas and won’t allow leaves to seep into your tea. It is made from 18-8 stainless steel and can hold enough loose leaf tea for 2-3 steeps. It is easily removable with the lip of the infuser.

Your purchase of this product, GROSCHE is able to provide 50+ days of safe drinking water to someone in need.

entry.title: Rise And Shine Herbal-40G- Canadian-New
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Herbal
Price: 15.00

Hand picked and ethically wildcrafted in the Canadian wilderness.  Why buy from around the world when you can purchase locally and grown right here in Canada.

 

Harvested in the Algonquin region in Ontario.  An uplifting tea but without the caffeine.

Ingredients: Labrador tea, nettle, peppermint, alfalfa, astragalus, meadowsweet, angelica, spearmint and ginseng

Brew 2-3 minutes at 180- 185F brew up to 3 times

Caffeine Free, no additives or preservatives

Certified organic by Pro-Cert

entry.title: Organic Peppermint-15G-Canadian-New

entry.title: Organic Dandelion Leaf - Herbal- 20G-Canadian-New
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Herbal
Price: 9.00


Our organic dandelion is grown and harvested from Alberta Canada.  We're very proud of our latest herbal. 

Spring time is a perfect time to start consuming dandelion tea.  May help with detoxifying your liver.  Dandelion is high in minerals such as iron, calcium, magnesium and potassium.  

Ingredients: 100% Organic Dandelion Leaf

Grown: Alberta, Canada

Steeping Instructions:  205°F – 5-10 mins. 

Caffeine: None

entry.summary:

Type: Black Tea
Price: 11.00


Intoxicating aroma with the flavour of wild blueberries. What an amazing blueberry treat.
A pinch of sugar makes a stunning tea, iced or hot!

Contains Caffeine

entry.title: Mason Jar Organic Grand River Zen-30G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Herbal
Price: 12.00

Packed in a zero waste 250ML mason jar.  

Sweet, exotic, with notes of fruit and a light spearmint finish.  What a perfect way to relax at the end of a long day.

The aroma is so inviting and relaxing.  Say ahhh!!!

Ingredients: Peppermint, Spearmint leaves, Honeybush, Camomile, Hibiscus, Calendula, Rose, Osmanthus petals.  Organic Certified

Grown: Washington-USA, Nile River Delta- Egypt, Cederburg-South Africa

Steeping Instructions: 2 teaspoons for 8 ounces – 205°F – 4-7 mins

entry.title: Mason Jar Organic Bella Coola Fruit-75G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Herbal
Price: 12.00

Packed in a zero waste 250ML mason jar.  Pick up orders only on scheduled pick up date.
A predominant orange character with the lovely sweetness of pineapple.  This is an amazing and refreshing fruit tea which is, wonderful hot or cold.  We love this one the best iced in the summer.  Let your imagination run wild with ways to serve as a cocktail with wine, liquor.  Give it a try. Iced tea heaven!
Luxury Ingredients: Apple, Rosehip, Orange pieces, Hibiscus petals, Natural flavours 
Small Batch Blended and Packed in: Canada
Tea(s) From: Turkey / Chile / Egypt
Caffeine Free
